messages.title: UNITING WEST OXFORDSHIRE & MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS
messages.content: We need strong and stable leadership to see the country through Brexit and beyond.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Regular business breakfast meetings and supporting local businesses.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Championing our NHS and Social Care Services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support NHS to deliver better care by ensuring adequate funding and policies.
Secure funding to build new homes and infrastructure to support local growth.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Robert continues to fight for a complete A40 fix
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Focus on major issues like fixing the A40, with plans to improve roads for local communities.
Improving broadband services to ensure rural areas are well connected.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Vital Jobs Secured at Brize Norton
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support for local RAF base Brize Norton to ensure job security and investment.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Robert Courts backs West Oxon's Schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support and fund local schools to ensure quality education for children.
